title: RANDOM ACTS OF VIOLENCE (2010) (Digital) (Darkness-Empire)
description:
Random Acts of Violence

SPLATTERMAN is the blood soaked story of two comic creators and their ultimate horror character creation gone very bad. A 'done-in-one' graphic novella that truly lives up to its title, it's all brought to you by the twisted minds of JIMMY PALMIOTTI and JUSTIN GRAY (JONAH HEX, POWERGIRL, BACK TO BROOKLYN) and illustrated by GIANCARLO CARACUZZO (THE LAST RESORT) and PAUL MOUNTS (POWERGIRL, WANTED) and lettered by BILL TORTOLINI.

Written by Justin Gray, Jimmy Palmiotti
Art by Giancarlo Caracuzzo, Paul Mounts

Genres: Drama, Horror, Mature

74 Pages
Print Release Date: Apr 28th 2010
Digital Release Date: Apr 20th 2011
Age Rating: 17+ Only
